summary: CollabForge is a skill-matching collaboration app for creatives (artists, singers, coders, writers) that uses a quiz-driven, dating-style smart matching system plus project-based discovery to help users find compatible collaborators by skills, style/genre, goals, availability, and vibe.
architectural_notes: Core differentiation is quiz-driven matching (not just search) combined with project postings to attract serious collaborators.
Consider toxicity mitigation if implementing reputation/ratings (e.g., optional, abuse reporting, private feedback).
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- CollabForge wordmark logo with subtle anvil/forge motif, clean modern style, transparent background (collabforge-logo.dim_1024x256.png)
- Minimal illustration of diverse creative tools (mic, pen, code brackets, paintbrush) in a cohesive flat style (creative-tools-illustration.dim_1200x800.png)
- Minimal empty-state illustration of two puzzle pieces or hands collaborating, flat style (collaboration-empty-state.dim_800x600.png)

existing_features.title: Implement Internet Identity sign-in and a first-run onboarding flow that creates a user account record and routes new users to set up their Creative Profile.

Create Creative Profile data model and CRUD: display name, bio, skill tags (multi-select), skill level, genres/styles (multi-select), goals (multi-select), availability, mood/vibe tags, inspirations (free-form list), portfolio links (typed URL list), and a “Looking for” text section.
Build a Creative Profile Quiz that collects matching inputs (experience/skill level, genres/styles, goals, availability, mood/vibe, inspirations) and stores quiz answers for use in matching.

Implement “Smart Matching” suggestions: generate a ranked list of collaborator suggestions using quiz/profile overlap (skills, genres/styles, goals, availability, vibe/inspirations) and show a dating-style swipe/like-pass UI that records likes and passes.

Add Project-based discovery: users can create project postings with title, description, category (album/game/comic/novel/etc.), genres/styles, vibe tags, goals, timeline/availability, roles needed (structured list), and optional external links; users can browse, filter, and view project details.

Implement project applications and invitations: users can apply to a project with a message and chosen role; project owners can review applicants, accept/reject, and optionally invite specific users to apply/join.
Provide collaboration spaces for accepted collaborators per project, including: a simple task board (To do / Doing / Done) and an async message board (text-only) for project communication.

Add optional collaboration history and ratings (minimal MVP): after a project is marked completed by the owner, members can rate each other on communication, reliability, and skill accuracy, and view received ratings summary on profiles.

Create core app navigation and pages: Landing (marketing + sign-in), Dashboard (matches + active projects), Profile (view/edit), Quiz, Matches (browse/like/pass), Projects (feed + create), Project Detail, Collaboration Space (tasks + messages), and Settings.

Define a coherent visual theme for CollabForge and apply it consistently across the app (colors, typography, spacing, component style, and key interaction patterns). Avoid blue/purple as the primary palette.
Generate and include essential static visual assets (logo + small UI illustrations) and render them in the UI (landing page and empty states) as static files served from the frontend.
Add basic account and safety controls: ability to delete own account (soft-delete), and ability to report a user/project (store report records for admin review later; no admin UI required).

new_feature_requests.summary: Creative profiles with skill tags, portfolio links, looking-for section, and optional collaboration history/ratings
Quiz-driven smart matching that suggests collaborators based on skills, style/genre, goals, availability, and creative chemistry (dating-style matching UX)
Project-based discovery: users can post projects, specify roles needed, and others can apply or be invited
Built-in collaboration tools: in-app chat, voice notes, file sharing, and a simple task board
Optional AI assistant for collaboration (lyric ideas, story prompts, code suggestions)
Style/vibe matching with mood/vibe tags and inspirations (artists/games/anime/books)
Monetization: free tier with limited matches/day + pro tier with unlimited matches, advanced filters, verified badge, priority placement; plus paid project boosts
Future: Collab reputation system with post-project ratings (communication, reliability, skill accuracy)
